data.title: Osheen Singh on LinkedIn: #linkedinposts #linkedinforcreators #linkedincontent #linkedinengagement‚Ä¶
data.meta_description:
‚ÄúWhen will I know I'm ready?‚Äù‚Ä®‚ÄúYou won't. It's a leap of faith. That‚Äôs all it is, Miles. A leap of faith.‚Äù

There is so much we aspire to do in life. But what‚Ä¶
data.text:
Allow yourself to be a beginner. No one starts off at the top‚Äù It‚Äôs okay to not have great results yet. It‚Äôs okay to suck in the beginning. It‚Äôs okay to make mistakes. It‚Äôs okay to fail. But it‚Äôs not okay to quit. It‚Äôs not okay to throw the towel and say, ‚Äúit‚Äôs not for me.‚Äù It‚Äôs not okay to give up on your dreams. It‚Äôs not okay to live an ‚Äúokay life‚Äù Why? Because you‚Äôre meant for greatness. You‚Äôre supposed to have a happy ending. You‚Äôre supposed to live a blessed life (if you choose to.) Because God has an amazing plan for you, plan to prosper you and not to harm you. So claim it! Believe in God‚Äôs promises. Because it never fails. He loves you so much and He delights in seeing you blessed! Keep going! Keep re-starting. Keep committing! Have a blessed weekend! #aimforgreateness #findlifepurpose #achieveit #thinkdigitalbusiness #investormindset #digitalbusinessmentor #learnandearnindigitalspace

üåü Happy National Take a Chance Day! Have you ever thought about what could happen if you took that next leap of faith? Whether it‚Äôs starting that project you‚Äôve been pondering, reaching out to a mentor, or finally booking your dream trip. But sometimes taking a chance, whether its big or small can be scary. When I'm overwhelmed with life, it's hard to think about taking chance or even just taking the next step forward! üòµüí´ Overwhelm sucks - and it gets between us and our dreams. Which is why I have created my FREE short training to help kick that overwhelm to the curb! I want to help you take that next leap of faith and take back your sanity, your peace of mind, and the hours you‚Äôd otherwise waste as you spiral into overwhelm. So grab my free SHORT training, and let me help you get past the overwhelm that's keeping you from taking a chance. What better day than today?? üåà Click the link down below to learn more! https://lnkd.in/ddcEKF2Q #tealhorizoncoaching #takeachance #leapoffaith #feelingoverwhelmed #selfreflection

I wanted to take a moment to share some words of encouragement and inspiration with all the incredible young teenagers out there. üí´ It's a time in your life filled with endless possibilities, and I want to remind you of the incredible potential you hold within yourselves. üåü üîπ Dream big: Don't limit your dreams and aspirations. Let your imagination soar and set audacious goals for yourselves. The sky is not the limit; it's just the beginning of your journey. üîπ Embrace curiosity: The world is your classroom, and every experience is an opportunity to learn and grow. Stay curious, ask questions, and never stop seeking knowledge. Embrace new ideas and perspectives, as they will shape your understanding of the world. üîπ Embrace failure as a stepping stone: Remember, failure is not the end; it's a valuable stepping stone on the path to success. Embrace it, learn from it, and use it as fuel to propel you towards your goals. Your resilience and ability to bounce back will be your greatest strength. üîπ Surround yourself with positivity: Surround yourself with supportive and like-minded individuals who believe in your dreams. Seek mentors who can guide you, inspire you, and help you navigate the challenges along the way. Together, you can achieve amazing things. üîπ Embrace your uniqueness: You are one-of-a-kind, with a set of talents and passions that make you special. Embrace your uniqueness and let it shine. Celebrate your strengths, and don't be afraid to take risks and pursue your passions wholeheartedly. üîπ Believe in yourself: Trust in your abilities and have confidence in what you can accomplish. Believe that you have the power to make a difference in the world. Your dreams are within reach, and with dedication and perseverance, you can turn them into reality. Remember, you have the potential to shape the future and make a positive impact on the world. Believe in yourselves, stay focused, and never underestimate your capabilities. The journey may have its ups and downs, but with determination and a growth mindset, you can conquer any challenge that comes your way. Keep shining brightly, young stars! ‚ú®üí™üèº And remember, the world is eagerly waiting to witness the incredible things you will achieve. Go out there and chase your dreams with unwavering passion and determination!

Glorrrrrry.üíÉ Today is the last day of the month. Who is as excited to cross over to August as I am? Going into the month of August, I want you to reflect on this üëá THERE IS NO PERFECT TIME. THE BEST TIME IS NOW. Is there a goal that you have for this month that you were not able to achieve? It's not too late to keep pursuing this goal. A Chinese proverb says "The best time to plant a tree was twenty years ago. The second best time is now." You can go back to that process you left. You won't achieve that goal without going through the process. The process could be stressful and tiring. I lie not, but, I trust you don't want to regret giving up on the process that would bring about your progress in the future. Someone is saying "The future will be bright. I have God." Yes, I know and believe that too, but God will not do for you what He has given you resources and wisdom to do. The progress that the future will bring starts from the process you intentionally go through today. Stop waiting for the perfect time, it's NOW. Stop procrastinating. Stop wasting time on things irrelevant to your purpose and goals. I love you and I'm rooting for your growth. #Empressofimpacts #GodsSpecialEsther #ThePrayingEmpressGodIsBuilding üì∏My tired self after my semester exams.

A Thousand Letters to Redemta‚ú® üí´I have composed a thousand heartfelt letters to my younger self. Sadly, they were all in the confines of my imagination. Undisclosed and hidden like my little secret treasures ü™ô Here is your first letterüõ©Ô∏è Dear Younger Redemta‚ú® As I pen this letter I am full of hope that your future is full of blessings and endless possibilities. Here are a few valuable lessons I wish I knew when I was your age. üå†Embrace continuous learning: Stay curious and never stop learning. Every bit of information you acquire will be a building block for your future. Embrace a growth mindset where you see challenges and failures as stepping stones to your success. By adopting this mindset you will not only achieve your goals but also become a better version of yourself. üí°Build strong support system: Cherish the people in your life. Family, buddies, and mentors will be your great pillars of support and guidance. Invest time in nurturing these connections even when you don't need them in the short term. It's building bridges before you desperately need them. üíéYour health is your wealth: Your physical and mental health are your most precious assets. Make them a priority, for they will enable you to achieve all your dreams. Take care of your health and it will indeed take care of you. Take this advice with a pinch of salt, dearest. üí∞Money matters: Plan for your financial future intentionally. Financial security will grant you freedom and peace of mind. Develop good saving culture and align your investment with your financial goals. I will say it again, invest first before impressing. ü™ôFinally, stay true to your values. This is what will keep you grounded and propel you forward in a world full of uncertainty. With love and wisdom from your future. Yours Redemta‚ú® ‚≠êüí´üåüWhat would you advice your younger self? Feel free to share your words of wisdom and let's grow together. #20dayslinkedinchallengewithhaoma #throwbackthursday #becoming #valuablelessons

I waited 24 long months for my Service Offer to manifest, and it nearly crushed me. *(What to do when things don't happen as fast as you'd like them to)* The hurt was terrible. All my friends moved forward, and I felt left behind, Abandoned. In retrospect, if I had to go over it again, I wouldn't want it any other way. Here were the surface reasons for the wait: ‚Ä¢The COVID 19 lockdown ‚Ä¢A not-ready Statement of Result ‚Ä¢An error in my name My then perceived reason: ‚Ä¢A demonic attack The real reason: ‚Ä¢My weak character and stamina God needed time to build my spirit and mind. If I had gone the way I was, I would've ruined things in my life, And in others' as well. I would have entered into all sorts of avoidable trouble. Plus, my joy wouldn't have been complete. But the delay saved me. Hear this: Your waiting season is not a tragedy, Neither is it a curse. It is YOUR TRAINING SEASON! Face it with honour. Don't spend any more time crying or complaining. Go through this curriculum in your destiny, and learn the lessons as FAST as you can. Only then will you move forward like a conqueror. The things I gained within and after that season could fill a book: ‚ÄìStrength of spirit and mind ‚ÄìMore beauty in character ‚ÄìMy 7-figure digital business (+ my future Change project), etc. I'm so glad God put me through it. And I know some will come again in the future. By His Grace, I'll learn and grow and flourish. So, honour those who have moved forward, But stay and grow. It won't crush you. It'll only secure your rise and make you glow brighter. Remember, I'm rooting for you. Keep rising and have a wonderful week ahead‚≠êÔ∏è #nysc #motivation #change

Discover My 2Ô∏è‚É£3Ô∏è‚É£ Lessons of 23 Years by Devoting 23 seconds‚Ä¶. As I turn 23 this year, I am eager to share the 2Ô∏è‚É£3Ô∏è‚É£ lessons which I learnt out of my bitter-sweet experiences by learning, falling, failing, overcoming and succeeding. 1Ô∏è‚É£You are the best in your own way 2Ô∏è‚É£You need not be a jack of all trades 3Ô∏è‚É£You need to master your skills 4Ô∏è‚É£Stay calm in every situation 5Ô∏è‚É£Build your career in 20s 6Ô∏è‚É£Choose your tribe wisely 7Ô∏è‚É£Never miss upon an opportunity 8Ô∏è‚É£ Let go > Carrying a baggage 9Ô∏è‚É£ Self- talk is a must 1Ô∏è‚É£0Ô∏è‚É£ Never feel defeated before getting defeated 1Ô∏è‚É£1Ô∏è‚É£ Avoid Overthinking, It is a slow poison 1Ô∏è‚É£2Ô∏è‚É£Embrace failures, it‚Äôs a part of life 1Ô∏è‚É£3Ô∏è‚É£ Health > Wealth 1Ô∏è‚É£4Ô∏è‚É£ Remember to Smile 1Ô∏è‚É£5Ô∏è‚É£ Explore new things 1Ô∏è‚É£6Ô∏è‚É£ Travel with your People 1Ô∏è‚É£7Ô∏è‚É£ Right Age, Right Time never comes 1Ô∏è‚É£8Ô∏è‚É£ Savings > Spendings 1Ô∏è‚É£9Ô∏è‚É£ Leave toxicity asap 2Ô∏è‚É£0Ô∏è‚É£ Family - First Priority 2Ô∏è‚É£1Ô∏è‚É£ Real Life > Reel life 2Ô∏è‚É£2Ô∏è‚É£ Make Memories 2Ô∏è‚É£3Ô∏è‚É£ Invest wisely (Time,Money,Efforts) Sooner or Later, Every person realises and experiences all what I have shared and I believe most of you will agree upon this. As we get older, we get to see the real picture of life and undoubtedly, it is full of surprises. It seems really hard but gradually everything gets simplied. I always wish to pause time and rewind the best days of my life. School Days were the Best Days for me. Now, ‚ÄúI would like to hear some lessons you learnt as you grew older.‚Äù Thankyou my famüíï #lessons #experiences #selfintrospection #learnings #selftalk

Don‚Äôt mind them, when people will say there is a casting down then will you arise and say there is a lifting up for you. Confess and be positive always. Dear Mentee, as we celebrate today as the end and last day for 2023 it is my earnest prayers for you to: 1. Be grateful that you are alive 2. Take stock of all positive or negative things that has happened to you 3. Review all your sets goals for 2023 either personal or business 4. Score yourself with fair assessment 5. Takeover or drop some of your goals as we enter 2024 6. Begin to set the new goals for 2024, it is not late to do so 7. Drop some habits that you have been struggling with and add new and better habits for 2024 8. Learn to show gratitude to God and to mankind 9. Things may be tough but be tougher 10. Don‚Äôt forget to develop more survival instincts and skills. If somehow I have added value in your lives then add me into your plans for 2024 then. I appreciate you all and individually. See you in 2024 Prof. Abner

I have never heard those words before. They couldn't have come from me. I was still busy struggling with the instruction when I heard them. I argued and resisted but......I heard them clear. 'HEAVENLY SCHOLARSHIP' I don't know who you are or what you told God. But my spirit won't rest. I have an instruction to open up the mastermind to those who want to join for free. I am sure you know how I feel about free trainings and how people do not value or take them seriously like paid sessions. So you know this is definitely not me talking. I have argued and argued but I want to stop fighting the Holy Spirit. If genuinely you desire to be part of the Reinvent2SOMETHINGBIGGER mastermind, you just got a 'HEAVENLY SCHOLARSHIP'. You can join us now. Everything initially advertised for the entire program will be made available to you free of charge. Here is the onboarding link. Click the link and fill the form NOW to get in. Once we start the link will be disabled and will not work again. https://lnkd.in/dmB4pTVq My only prayer is that you will understand the opportunity you've been given and take it seriously. I have done my part. I am Nina Ogwo/TEDxSpeaker- DBrandandBookArchitect #personaltransformation #reinventyourself #personaldevelopement #Reinvent2SOMETHINGBIGGER #transformation #linkedincreator
